text: Just logged on this AM and got a note about a post being removed. Only showed the URL and not the image. Copied down the URL and visited it to find a meme of Bugs Bunny saying NO. Seriously FB. Get your algorithms under control. Last time it was an album cover for Green Day’s American Idiot. You let so much slide for so many ACTUAL offenders and slap others for NOTHING.

title: Facebook account on laptop…
text:
I just spent two hours trying to open my full Facebook account on my laptop. I can access it on my iPhone, but only get my public page on my laptop. I have searched Google for answers to no avail.
I am very unhappy at the difficulty in performing this seemingly simple function!

title: Censoring is an issue!
text:
Facebook has made it very clear they are censoring and preventing users from using their freedom of speech! The Fact Checkers are ridiculous! Leaving for another social media platform! Enough is enough!

Do not like the newest version of FB.  Not user friendly at all.  Trying to edit a post is now difficult (the pop-up menu disappears before you can make a selection).   The look, layout and user-friendliness is terrible.  Please go back to how it looked and was used previously!
